INFORMATION

Stack

This site was built with the following stack. Each link directs you to free resources where you can read the documentation.

  • Site Generator: 11ty
  • Frontend: HTML and JavaScript
  • Animations: CSS and GSAP

Coding Resources

  • W3Schools
  • freeCodeCamp
  • MDN Web Docs
  • 11ty for Beginners - Kevin Powell

Author

Created with love (and a bit of anxiety) by hellogaray. Feel free to use it for personal purposes, contribute improvements, or ask questions via the GitHub repository.

Copyright

© Covers and quotes belong to their respective authors. The source code is provided here under the repository’s license. Unauthorized commercial use is prohibited.

garden

A quiet space where the books I've read and the quotes that moved me take root and grow. This is a living archive — part memory, part reflection — where ideas are planted, connected, and allowed to evolve over time. Feel free to wander, explore, and revisit.
